title: 15 "Curse of the Egyptian Pharaoh - Part II"(Japanese:「埃及大王呪術地獄」〜第三段〜) January 14, 2000(2000-01-14)
transformers_text: 15 Curse of the Egyptian Pharaoh Part II Japanese January 14 2000 2000 01 14 Sakon believes that Kisaragi is innocent He also finds that there are numerous tensions within the museum staff and that the director was unpopular Sakon asks Ka or uk o to delay the arrest for 24 hours to give him time to prove Kisaragi's innocence
tf_idf_text: curse egyptian pharaoh part japanese january sakon believe kisaragi innocent also find numerous tension within museum staff director unpopular sakon ask delay arrest hour give time prove kisaragis innocence
